name: Outpatient Services
description: Edgewood’s Therapy and Assessment Clinic offers one-to-one therapy, family therapy, and psychological assessment services for youth, young adults, and their families in the San Francisco Bay Area. Services are offered in a home-like cottage setting in the Sunset District of San Francisco. They also offer therapy services in the community, or through telehealth. Their therapists empower youth and families with the tools, care, and expertise needed to face life’s challenges. They serve youth ages
